Headline: #95 95th and #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 95, and 112 buses temp. rerouted EB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, and Terminal; WB: 95th, Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th and #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Eggleston, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, and Terminal.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th, Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line  trains are running w/residual delays and following an earlier mechaical problem at Cumberland. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line  trains are running w/residual delays and following an earlier mechaical problem at Cumberland.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
